fields.name: "Finally joining the Cult, they didn't trust you enough to give you their names, just a weapon and a job. The job is simple:
fields.value:
Kill all enemies of the Cult. If you do this, you will finally be a full member of the Cult."
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> During the day, learn someone's true role. This is not fooled by frames or disguises. 1 use.

> During the night, deal a Basic attack to someone. 2 uses. +1 use if you find a Cult Member with your day ability.

> During the night, attack someone with an Unstoppable wound. This acts like a poison, and if they are not healed they die at the end of the next night. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> This role is converted from Town (Espionage) roles.

> If you are converted, the Cult will know who you are, but will not be able to whisper you until you whisper them first.

> You are roleblock immune when using your Unstoppable wound.
